thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Elliot McBride
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Elliot McBride

author: Elliot McBride
title: Elliot McBride
text: FRAMEDIRECT is my favorite place to shop for Sunglasses. My Persol PO8714S folding are compact easy to carry, good quality, attractive and easy to store. Framedirect has a large selection of sunglasses to choose from but for some unknown reason I always choose Persol. This is my 6th pair.
